ch0039_40_viola/0101_0701_01_10:
Oh, you came, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
The conditions today are great for taking
snapshots!
ch0039_40_viola/0101_0701_02_10:
There’s bound to be a great photo op waiting for
us—one the likes of which we’ve never seen!
ch0039_40_viola/7101_0701_01_10:
A long time ago, people used to think that
having your photo taken would steal your soul!
ch0039_40_viola/7101_0701_02_10:
If that were true, do you think I would’ve become
a Ghost-type user?
ch0039_40_viola/7102_0701_01_10:
I want to get shots of everyone smiling happily as
they receive their presents! Fantastic! Just fantastic!
ch0039_40_viola/7102_0701_02_10:
C’mon, you too! Stand next to your Pokémon—and
say cheese!
ch0039_40_viola/7103_0701_01_10: My older sister gave me my camera.
ch0039_40_viola/7103_0701_02_10:
Small things like that can really change your life!
Just like Pokémon!
ch0039_40_viola/7104_0701_01_10:
Bug Pokémon grow up so quickly, it can be hard
to catch them on camera!
ch0039_40_viola/7104_0701_02_10:
It kind of reminds me of you, getting stronger
day-by-day!
ch0039_40_viola/7105_0701_01_10:
My Vivillon has a pure white pattern, just like
snow!
ch0039_40_viola/7105_0701_02_10:
She’s quite resilient against the cold, too... Maybe
she was born somewhere cold.
ch0039_40_viola/7105_0701_03_10:
Why don’t you try raising a bunch of different
Vivillon, [Name:PlayerNickname ]? It’d be
fantastic! Just fantastic!
ch0039_40_viola/1701_0701_01_10: Here’s a special present just for you!
ch0039_40_viola/1701_0702_01_10: I hope it helps you have the best day ever!
ch0039_40_viola/2501_0701_01_10:
Taking photos of people and Pokémon is totally
different from taking landscape photos!
ch0039_40_viola/2501_0701_02_10:
If you asked me which I prefer, well...
Hmm, that’s a tough question!
ch0039_40_viola/2501_0701_03_10:
So that’s why...taking photos of people and
Pokémon surrounded by gorgeous scenery would
be fantastic! Just fantastic!
ch0039_40_viola/2501_0702_01_10:
Should I stand back and take a photo that captures
the whole atmosphere? Or zoom in to really
express each subject’s individual sparkle?
ch0039_40_viola/2501_0702_02_10:
Trying to decide which would stand out more
is part of what makes photography so interesting!
ch0039_40_viola/2511_0701_01_10:
If I were to get a present...I’d like to get the time
to go on a trip with my camera!
ch0039_40_viola/2511_0701_02_10:
Have you heard of the Bug-Catching Contest in
Johto? I really want to enter it sometime!
ch0039_40_viola/2511_0701_03_10:
But I might get wrapped up in taking
pictures than actually catching anything...
ch0039_40_viola/2511_0702_01_10:
If you slather honey on a tree and then wait for a
bit, you’ll find the tree packed with Bug Pokémon!
ch0039_40_viola/2511_0702_02_10:
But to catch them or to photograph them... That is
the question.
ch0039_40_viola/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning! Since I woke up early, I might run
across lots of things to photograph!
ch0039_40_viola/3003_0701_01_10:
Now’s the time of day when the folks in my
viewfinder start getting lively—they’re all smiles!
ch0039_40_viola/3005_0701_01_10:
Sometimes it can be nice to see the night scenery
with your own eyes rather than through a
camera, don’t you think?
